name: Parallel Paths (itch)
description:
Designer
Gary Babich

Class/Semester
Game Design Technologies M102, Spring 2017

Engine
GameMaker Studio

Genre
Puzzle Platformer

Description
Parallel Paths is a platforming game about traveling through the underground and solving puzzles that requires players to control two characters simultaneously, all without dying. This can include opening doors that the other unit can’t reach or surviving leaps of faith over a pit of spikes.

http://mcgamedesign.com/
